snippet: Golden State Warriors forward Kevin Durant wants the National Basketball Association to become less transparent, at least when it comes to its review of referee decisions....
lead_paragraph: Golden State Warriors forward Kevin Durant wants the National Basketball Association to become less transparent, at least when it comes to its review of referee decisions.

headline.main: Durant Slams NBA for 'Throwing Refs Under the Bus'
headline.print_headline: Durant Slams NBA for 'Throwing Refs Under the Bus'
